messages.message: Yeah also @alagu since this is related to the home page. If we want full consistency I think we need the chevron. I think ideally we have a split button https://www.nngroup.com/articles/split-buttons/ (@Serena / @Jessica what we briefly touched on)

letâ€™s make a decision asap if we want to backport a change to 24.38? the prod deployment for 24.38 is scheduled for next monday

as @Jessica mentioned, the 2 options are (1) remove the dropdown or (2) add a chevron and left-align the dropdown with the button
My recommendation is that for the sake of `24.38` lets keep it consistent meaning that we go with option (2). We can look at split buttons later.
@Weiming Wu do you have time for this this week? if not, i can also take it!
